sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"选择"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: choice, alternative, preference, option, selection, election
means: choice ： 侧重指自由选择的权利或特权。
alternative ： 指在相互排斥的两者之间作严格的选择，也可指在两者以上中进行选择。
preference ： 侧重因偏见、爱好或判断等而进行选择。
option ： 着重特别给予的选择权利或权力，所选物常常相互排斥。
selection ： 指作广泛的选择，着重选择者的识别力或鉴赏力。
election ： 强调目的和达到目的判断能力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French, or from Latin optio(n-), from the stem of optare 'choose'. The verb dates from the 1930s

encyclopedia.content: 期权（option）又称为选择权，是在期货的基础上产生的一种衍生性金融工具。从其本质上讲，期权实质上是在金融领域中将权利和义务分开进行定价，使得权利的受让人在规定时间内对于是否进行交易，行使其权利，而义务方必须履行。在期权的交易时，购买期权的一方称作买方，而出售期权的一方则叫做卖方；买方即是权利的受让人，而卖方则是必须履行买方行使权利的义务人。

entry.def: An option is something that you can choose to do in preference to one or more alternatives.

example.ex: He's argued from the start that America and its allies are putting too much emphasis on the military option...
example.tran: 他从一开始就认为美国及其盟国过于强调军事手段。

example.ex: What other options do you have?
example.tran: 你还有什么别的选择吗？

entry.def: If you have the option of doing something, you can choose whether to do it or not.

example.ex: Criminals are given the option of going to jail or facing public humiliation...
example.tran: 罪犯可以选择要么坐牢，要么遭受当众羞辱。

example.ex: We had no option but to abandon the meeting.
example.tran: 我们别无选择，只有放弃这次会面。

entry.def: In business, an option is an agreement or contract that gives someone the right to buy or sell something such as property or shares at a future date.

example.ex: Each bank has granted the other an option on 19.9% of its shares.
example.tran: 两家银行都同意给予对方其19.9%股份的期权。

entry.def: An option is one of a number of subjects which a student can choose to study as a part of his or her course.

example.ex: Several options are offered for the student's senior year.
example.tran: 为毕业班学生开设了几门选修课。

entry.tran: 暂不作决定；保留选择权
entry.def: If you keep your options open or leave your options open, you delay making a decision about something.

example.ex: I am keeping my options open. I have not made a decision on either matter.
example.tran: 我保留选择权，这两件事我都还没有作出决定。

entry.tran: 最容易的选择；最保险的选择
entry.def: If you take the soft option, you do the thing that is easiest or least likely to cause trouble in a particular situation.

example.ex: We take the soft option. I like to keep the crowd happy because that's what they pay for...
example.tran: 我们决定采取最保险的方案。我希望让观众开心，因为他们就是为这个掏钱的。

example.ex: The job of chairman can no longer be regarded as a convenient soft option.
example.tran: 别再以为董事长这份工作是那么容易做的。

means.word_mean: 1. the right to buy or sell property at an agreed price; the right is purchased and if it is not exercised by a stated date the money is forfeited
2. one of a number of things from which only one can be chosen;
3. the act of choosing or selecting;

opt视力+ic……的→adj.眼的,视觉的,光学上的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 选择[权],[商]选择买卖的特权
stems_affixes.word_buile: opt选择+ion表名词→n.选择[权],[商]选择买卖的特权
syn共同+ops=opt选择+is→共同选出→摘要
ad一再+opt选择→一再选择出来→采用,采纳

Sentence.sentence: Prepare themselves for different job options.

But taking a cue from health experts, a group of 19 restaurant companies are pledging to offer more-healthful menu options for children at a time when concern is growing over the role of fast food in childhood obesity(肥胖症).
Instead, the company said Tuesday, its employees will ask parents whether they prefer such options as milk or sliced apples before assembling the meals
Generous parental leave policies and readily available part-time options have unintended consequences:instead of strengthening women's attachment to the workplace,they appear to weaken it.
Other universities are exploring their options.
Partly this is a result of how bleak the academic job market is, but there's also a rising awareness of career options that Ph

sentences.en: You will have to pay them; you have no option.
sentences.cn: 你必须付给他们钱, 别无选择。

sentences.en: The government has two options; to reduce spending or to increase taxes.
sentences.cn: 政府有两种选择的办法:或是减少开支, 或是增加税收。

sentences.en: The car includes air-conditioning among its options.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的配件中包括空调设备。

sentences.en: Jones has taken an option on shares in the company.
sentences.cn: 琼斯已获得那家公司股票的期权。
